Question:
Ekibuuzo kino kikwata ku bintu bino wammanga.
Okusooka tuteekwa okugamba nti obwengula bwa spherical mu foomu, mu ngeri emu kubanga foomu eno okubeera ekintu ekituukiridde nga tekyetaagisa binywa, y'esinga okujjuzibwa ku byonna, mu ngeri emu kubanga ekola foomu esinga okuba ey'amaanyi, ekisinga obulungi okubeeramu n'okukuuma buli kimu; oba nate kubanga ebitundu byonna ebikola obwengula, kwe kugamba enjuba, omwezi ne pulaneti birabika mu ngeri eno; oba olw'okuba buli kimu kifuba okutuuka ku kifaananyi kino, nga bwe kirabika mu madonnye g'amazzi n'ebitundu ebirala eby'amazzi singa bagezaako okwetegeera. N'olwekyo, tewali n'omu ajja kubuusabuusa nti ekifaananyi ekyo kiri mu mibiri gy'omu ggulu. ...
N'olwekyo, tekyewuunyisa nti ensi nayo ya spherical, kubanga enyigiriza okuva ku njuyi zonna ku makkati gaayo. Wadde ng'ensozi n'ensozi eziri mu biwonvu tebisobola kutegeerwa bulungi, naye kino tekikwata ku mbeera y'ensi. ...
Okuva bwe kibadde kiragibwa dda nti ensi erina enkula y'enkulungo, tuteekwa okulowooza oba entambula nayo ekwatagana n'enkula eno, n'ekifo ensi ky'erina mu bwengula. ... Kya lwatu, abawandiisi abasinga obungi bakkiriza nti ensi ekyali wakati mu bwengula, era balowooza nti tekisoboka kulowooza nti si kituufu. Naye singa ensonga eno bagipima n'obwegendereza, kijja kulabibwa nti ekibuuzo tekinnaba kugonjoolwa n'olwekyo tewali ngeri yonna gye tuyinza kukitwalamu ng'ekikulu. Buli nkyukakyuka y'ekifo ekirabibwa kiva ku ntambula y'ekintu ekirabibwa oba eky'omuntu eyeetegereza, oba okutambula kw'ebitundu byombi. ... Mu kiseera kino okuva ku nsi, enkyukakyuka ez'omu ggulu zireetebwa era zikolebwa eri amaaso gaffe. N'olwekyo ensi bw'eba terina nkyukakyuka yonna entambula eno eteekwa okubaawo mu buli kintu ekiri ebweru w'ensi, wabula mu ngeri ey'enjawulo okusinga singa buli kimu ku nsi kitambula, era eky'ekika kino kye kikyukakyuka eya buli lunaku. N'olwekyo kino kirabika kikwata ku bwengula bwonna, kwe kugamba, buli kintu ekiri ebweru w'ensi okuggyako ensi yennyini. Kyokka singa omuntu akkiriza nti entambula eno teyali ya njawulo mu ggulu, wabula ensi yali etambula okuva mu bugwanjuba okudda mu buvanjuba, era singa kino kyalowoozebwako n'obwegendereza ku bikwata ku njuba, omwezi n'emmunyeenye ebirabika ng'ebiyimiridde n'okugwa, kijja kuzuulibwa nti eno y'embeera entuufu."

A.bye bye cosmos spherical
B.Ensi ya spherical.
C.bye bye geostatic
D.Ettaka teririiko.
GivenAnswer:

Copernicus annyonnyola nti ensi eri mu foomu ya spherical. Agamba nti "tekyewuunyisa nti ensi nayo ya spherical, kubanga enyigiriza okuva ku njuyi zonna ku makkati gaayo." Kino kya njawulo ku ndowooza za Aristotelian ez'omu kiseera kye ezagamba nti ensi yali ya flat.

Question:

Question:

C.India's caste system
D.Obukambwe mu kitundu kye

Ensonga endala teziraga bulungi lwaki Riva yandyagadde okudda mu Amerika:

- Obwavu obw'amaanyi si nsonga esobola okumukwasa okudda mu Amerika kubanga obwavu bwe kizibu ekisangibwa mu nsi zombi.

Question:
Obusongasonga obuleetebwa mu kiyingi (inductor) bukiikirirwa nga,
A.product of its inductance and current through it.
B.ratio of its inductance to current through it.
C.ratio of current through it to its inductance.
D.Product of its inductance and rate of change of current through it.
GivenAnswer:
Okwanukula ekibuuzo kino, ka twekenneenya buli kawayiro:

A. Obusongasonga obuleetebwa mu kiyingi (inductor) si bwe bukiikirirwa nga product of its inductance and current through it. Kino tekikola.

B. Obusongasonga obuleetebwa mu kiyingi (inductor) si bwe bukiikirirwa nga ratio of its inductance to current through it. Nayo eno tekikola.

C. Obusongasonga obuleetebwa mu kiyingi (inductor) si bwe bukiikirirwa nga ratio of current through it to its inductance. Eno nayo tekikola.

D. Obusongasonga obuleetebwa mu kiyingi (inductor) bukiikirirwa nga Product of its inductance and rate of change of current through it. Eno y'ensonga entuufu.

Mu bimpimpi, obusongasonga mu kiyingi (inductor) buva ku inductance n'obwangu obw'okukyuka kw'omusayi oguyitamu. Kino kitegeeza nti singa omusayi gukyuka mangu, obusongasonga bunaabeera bungi. Era singa inductance ya kiyingi eri waggulu, obusongasonga bunaabeera bungi.

N'olw'ekyo, okuddamu okutuufu kwe "D. Product of its inductance and rate of change of current through it."

Question:
Enkyusa eya negatiivu (negative residual autocorrelation) eragibwa ku kimu ku bino wammanga?
A.A cyclical pattern in the residuals
B.Enkyukakyuka mu bisigalira
C.A complete randomness in the residuals
D.Ebisigalira byonna biri kumpi ne zero
GivenAnswer:
Enkyusa eya negatiivu (negative residual autocorrelation) eragibwa ku kimu ku bino wammanga:

C. A complete randomness in the residuals (Ebisigalira okubeera nga tebiri na nkolagana yonna)

Enkyusa eya negatiivu eba bw'ebeera nti ebisigalira tebiri na nkolagana yonna era nga biri ku mutindo gwa random. Kino kitegeeza nti tewali pattern oba enkolagana yonna wakati w'ebisigalira, era buli kisigalira tekifaananako n'ekiddako.

Ebiddibwamu ebirala:

A. A cyclical pattern in the residuals - Kino kitegeeza nti waliwo pattern etaataaganyizibwa mu bisigalira, so si bya random.

B. Enkyukakyuka mu bisigalira - Kino tekitegeeza nti waliwo enkyusa eya negatiivu, wabula kitegeeza nti waliwo enkyukakyuka mu bunene bw'ebisigalira.

D. Ebisigalira byonna biri kumpi ne zero - Kino tekitegeeza nti waliwo enkyusa eya negatiivu, wabula kitegeeza nti ebisigalira biri kumpi n'okuba zero, ekisobola okuba ekirungi oba ekibi okusinziira ku context.

Question:

Question:
Ku bino, kiki ekifuula okutegeera okukwataganyizibwa kw'enkulaakulana y'ebika eby'enjawulo okwesigamiziddwa ku nkola ya amino acid eya homologous proteins okutwalira awamu okuba okutali kutuufu okusinga okutegeera okukwatagana okwesigamiziddwa ku nucleotide sequences za homologous genes?
A.Enkyukakyuka eza siriimu
B.Okukoppa obuzindaalo
C.Ebintu ebikyusa obutoffaali bw'omubiri
D.Okusomoka
GivenAnswer:
Okwanukula okutuufu kwe nti C. Ebintu ebikyusa obutoffaali bw'omubiri.

Ensonga lwaki kino kye kifo ekituufu:

1. Ebintu ebikyusa obutoffaali bw'omubiri bisobola okukyusa amino acids mu protein nga tebikyusa nucleotide sequence mu gene. Kino kitegeeza nti proteins ezirina amino acid sequences ezifaanagana zisobola okuba nga ziva mu genes ezitali zimu.

2. Okukoppa obuzindaalo n'okusomoka bikyusa nucleotide sequence mu gene naye nga tebikyusa amino acid sequence mu protein. Kino kitegeeza nti genes ezirina nucleotide sequences ezitali zimu zisobola okuvaamu proteins ezirina amino acid sequences ezifaanagana.

3. Enkyukakyuka eza siriimu zikyusa nucleotide sequence ne amino acid sequence, naye kino tekitera kubaawo nnyo okusinga ebikyusa obutoffaali bw'omubiri.

N'olwekyo, ebintu ebikyusa obutoffaali bw'omubiri bye bisinze okuteeka enjawulo wakati w'okukwatagana kwa proteins n'okukwatagana kwa genes, era bye biviirako okutegeera okukwatagana kwa proteins okuba nga tekutuufu nnyo okusinga okwo okukwatagana kwa genes.

Question:

D.Okwambala engoye ez'ekika kya goggles ne nitrile-type gloves n'okukuuma ebikonge byonna ebya acetone nga biggaddwa

Okuddamu okutuufu kwandibadde D: Okwambala engoye ez'ekika kya goggles ne nitrile-type gloves n'okukuuma ebikonge byonna ebya acetone nga biggaddwa.

Question:
Manya h+(aq) concentration mu 1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH, solution. (The Ka for phenol is 1 × 10^-10.)
A.1 × 10^-10 M
B.1 × 10^-9 M
C.1 × 10^-3 M
D.1 × 10^-5 M
GivenAnswer:
To find the H+(aq) concentration in a 1.0 M phenol solution, we need to use the acid dissociation constant (Ka) for phenol. Let's solve this problem step by step.

Given:
- Phenol concentration: [C6H5OH] = 1.0 M
- Ka for phenol: 1 × 10^-10

Step 1: Write the acid dissociation reaction for phenol.
C6H5OH + H2O ⇌ C6H5O- + H3O+

Step 2: Set up the ICE table (Initial, Change, Equilibrium) for the dissociation of phenol.

|         | C6H5OH   | H2O | C6H5O-   | H3O+     |
|---------|----------|-----|----------|----------|
| Initial | 1.0 M    | -   | 0        | 0        |
| Change  | -x       | -   | +x       | +x       |
| Equil.  | (1.0-x)M | -   | x M      | x M      |

Step 3: Write the Ka expression for phenol.
Ka = ([C6H5O-][H3O+]) / [C6H5OH]

Step 4: Substitute the equilibrium concentrations into the Ka expression.
1 × 10^-10 = (x^2) / (1.0 - x)

Since Ka is very small, we can assume that x is much smaller than 1.0 M. Therefore, (1.0 - x) ≈ 1.0.

1 × 10^-10 ≈ (x^2) / 1.0

Step 5: Solve for x (which represents the concentration of H3O+ at equilibrium).
x^2 ≈ 1 × 10^-10
x ≈ √(1 × 10^-10) = 1 × 10^-5

Therefore, the H+(aq) concentration in a 1.0 M phenol solution is approximately 1 × 10^-5 M.

The correct answer is D. 1 × 10^-5 M.

Question:
Tanka eri mu kifaananyi kya prism ey'ebitundu bisatu. Bwe kiba nti omusingi gw'enguudo ssatu gulina ekifo kya ffuuti 116, ate nga tanka ya ffuuti 30 obuwanvu, tanka yandibaddemu amazzi mangi kwenkana wa ng'ejjudde?

C.3480 ft^3
D.6960 ft^3
GivenAnswer:
Okuzuula obungi bw'amazzi agajjula tanka ey'ebitundu bisatu, tusooka okukanya ebipimo by'omusingi n'obuwanvu bwa tanka okuzuula obungi bw'ekifo munda mu tanka.

Omusingi gw'enguudo ssatu gulina ekifo kya ffuuti 116. Kino kitegeeza nti buli luuyi lwa tanka lulina ffuuti 116 ÷ 3 = 38.67 ez'obuwanvu.

Tanka ya ffuuti 30 obuwanvu.

Okuzuula obungi bw'ekifo munda mu tanka, tukozesa empandika eno:
Obungi = 1/3 × Ekifo ky'omusingi × Obuwanvu
        = 1/3 × (38.67 × 38.67 × 1.73/4) × 30
        = 1/3 × 1495.4 × 30
        = 1/3 × 44862
        = 14954 ft^3

Noolwekyo tanka bw'ejjula amazzi, eyinza okubamu amazzi aga ffuuti 14954 ez'ekikulukutu. Tewali kuddamu kutuufu nnyo mu byokuddamu ebiweeddwa. Okusingira ddala okumpi kwe kuddamu C. 3480 ft^3, naye ssi kutuufu nnyo.

Question:
Enkyukakyuka ezireeta achondroplasia zikola ekintu ekiyinza okuteekebwa mu kibinja nga:
A.bye bye dominant negative.
B.bye bye function!
C.haploinsufficiency.
D.loss of function, bye bye
GivenAnswer:
Okuddamu kwo kuli nti A. bye bye dominant negative.

Achondroplasia ereeterwa enkyukakyuka mu gene erina amateeka agakola ku kukula kw'amagumba. Enkyukakyuka eno eviirako ekintu ekiyitibwa "dominant negative effect." Kino kitegeeza nti gene enkyuse esobola okutaataaganya enkola ya gene entuufu, ne kiviirako endwadde wadde nga gene emu yokka eba ekyusiddwa.

Mu ngeri endala:

- B. "bye bye function" tekkiriziganya na kino kubanga enkyukakyuka tezigyawo ddala enkola ya gene, wabula zigikyusa mu ngeri embi.

- C. "haploinsufficiency" kitegeeza nti gene emu bw'ekyusibwa, eyo esigaddewo tesobola kukola bulungi. Naye kino ssi kye kiviirako achondroplasia.

- D. "loss of function, bye bye" nayo tekkiriziganya kubanga mu achondroplasia, gene ekyusiddwa ebeera ekyasobola okukola, naye mu ngeri etali ntuufu.

N'olw'ekyo, enkyukakyuka ezireeta achondroplasia zikolera ku dominant negative effect, era ky'ekiviirako okulwala kuno.

Question:
Funa $-\dfrac{1}{-3}\cdot\cfrac{1}{~\frac{1}{-3}}}.$
A.1
B.-1
C.0
D.2
GivenAnswer:
Let's solve this step by step:

1) First, let's simplify the fraction inside the parentheses. We have $\frac{1}{-3}$ in the denominator. To simplify this, we can multiply both the numerator and denominator by -3:

   $\cfrac{1}{~\frac{1}{-3}} = \cfrac{1 \cdot (-3)}{~\frac{1}{-3} \cdot (-3)} = \cfrac{-3}{1} = -3$

2) Now our expression looks like this:

   $-\dfrac{1}{-3} \cdot (-3)$

3) When we multiply fractions, we multiply the numerators and denominators separately:

   $-\dfrac{1}{-3} \cdot (-3) = \dfrac{1 \cdot (-3)}{-3 \cdot 1} = \dfrac{-3}{-3}$

4) Simplify:

   $\dfrac{-3}{-3} = 1$

Therefore, the correct answer is A. 1.

Question:

Question:
Okutambula ku sipiidi esooka eya 1.5 × 10^6 m/s, proton eyingira mu kitundu ekya magineeti eya bulijjo eya 1.5 T. Singa sipiidi ya proton eyasooka ekola endabirwamu ya 30° n'obusannyalazo bwa magineeti, kibala sipiidi ya proton 4 s ng'omaze okuyingira mu magineeti.
A.5.0 × 10^6 m/s

D.3.0 × 10^6 m/s
GivenAnswer:
Okuzuula sipiidi ya proton oluvannyuma lwa kuyingira mu kitundu kya magineeti, tulina okukozesa ekiwandiiko kya Lorentz Force. Bino by'ebigenda mu maaso:

Ebintu ebiweebwa:
- Sipiidi eya proton esooka (v₀) = 1.5 × 10^6 m/s
- Obusannyalazo bwa magineeti (B) = 1.5 T
- Endabirwamu wakati wa sipiidi esooka n'obusannyalazo bwa magineeti (θ) = 30°
- Ekiseera proton ky'emala mu kitundu kya magineeti (t) = 4 s

Okuva mu kiwandiiko kya Lorentz Force, sipiidi ya proton tekyuka mu bunene naye ekyuka mu ndabirwamu yokka. Kino kitegeeza nti sipiidi ya proton oluvannyuma lwa kuyingira mu kitundu kya magineeti ejja kusigala nga 1.5 × 10^6 m/s.

Noolwekyo, okuddamu kwa nsonga eno kwe "C. 1.5 × 10^6 m/s".

Question:
Mu xy-plane, graph ya x^(log y) = y^log x
A.1 1 1 10 11 15 1
B.a closed curve
C.A ray in the open first quadrant
D.bye bye single point
GivenAnswer:
Let's approach this step by step:

1) First, let's simplify the equation. We can use the properties of logarithms to rewrite it:

   x^(log y) = y^(log x)
   
   Taking log on both sides:
   
   log(x^(log y)) = log(y^(log x))
   
   (log x)(log y) = (log y)(log x)

2) This is an identity. It's true for all positive values of x and y (since logarithm is only defined for positive numbers). This eliminates option D, as the graph is not a single point.

3) If we take y = 1, then for any value of x, the equation becomes:

   (log x)(log 1) = (log 1)(log x)
   
   0 = 0
   
   This is true for all x > 0. Similarly, if we take x = 1, it's true for all y > 0. This means the graph includes the lines x = 1 and y = 1 (for x, y > 0). This matches with option A.

4) For any other positive value of x and y, the equation is also satisfied. This means the graph fills the entire first quadrant (x > 0, y > 0). It's not a closed curve (eliminating option B), and it's not just a ray (eliminating option C).

Therefore, the correct answer is A: the graph of x^(log y) = y^(log x) on the xy-plane includes the lines x = 1 and y = 1 for x, y > 0, and it fills the entire first quadrant.

Question:

Question:
Omuntu bw'ayiga obutaba na buyambi kiyinza okuba nga kikwatagana butereevu n'ebyo by'ayiga
A.bye bye barnum effect!
B.bye bye self bias!
C.ekifo eky'ebweru eky'okufuga.
D.tewali nsonga yonna.
GivenAnswer:
Okusinziira ku nsonga eziweereddwa, okuddamu okutuufu kwandibadde:

C. ekifo eky'ebweru eky'okufuga.

Ekifo eky'ebweru eky'okufuga (external locus of control) kitegeeza nti omuntu akkiriza nti ebintu ebituukako bisinziira ku mbeera ez'ebweru, so si ku bikolwa oba enneeyisa ye. Omuntu bw'ayiga obutaba na buyambi, ayinza okukikwataganya n'ebintu ebiri ebweru w'obuyinza bwe, nga ebimu ku ebyo by'ayiga.

Ebirala:
- Barnum effect kwe kutwala nti ebintu ebyogerwako nga bya bulijjo bituufu eri omuntu ku bwomuntu.
- Self bias kwe kwerowooza nti oli wa njawulo okusinga abalala.

N'olwekyo, okuddamu okutuufu kwandibadde C, ekifo eky'ebweru eky'okufuga.

Question:

Question:

Mu nsonga eno, tebayogerako ku bungi bwa zeros, yadde okutandika oba okumalirizibwa kwa string. Ensonga eyogerwako kwe kuba nti string erina okuba ne zeros ezenkana. Kino kye kigambo ekikulu mu kuddamu okwo.

Question:
Eky'okuba nti ekirungo ekiyitibwa infrared absorption frequency of deuterium chloride (DCl) kikyusibwa okuva ku kya hydrogen chloride (HCl) kiva ku njawulo mu ngeri gye kikolebwamu
A.Engabanya y'amasannyalaze (electron distribution)
B.dipole moment
C.Amaanyi ga bulijjo
D.Bye bye reduced mass
GivenAnswer:
Okuddamu kw'ekibuuzo kino, ekirungo ekiyitibwa infrared absorption frequency of deuterium chloride (DCl) kikyusibwa okuva ku kya hydrogen chloride (HCl) olw'enjawulo mu bye bye reduced mass.

Reduced mass y'omolekule gwe mugatte ogw'ebirime by'atomi ezikola omolekule ogwo. Bino birime bya atomi bisobola okwawukanako nnyo, era kino kiviirako enjawulo mu reduced mass.

Hydrogen ne deuterium birina enjawulo mu birime byabyo. Deuterium erina ekirime ekirala eky'enyongeza ku kya hydrogen olw'enewtulo ey'enyongeza. Kino kireeta enjawulo mu reduced mass za HCl ne DCl.

Enjawulo mu reduced mass eviirako enjawulo mu mawendo g'okukubisa okw'omolekule (vibrational frequency). Kino kye kiviirako enjawulo mu infrared absorption frequencies za HCl ne DCl.

N'olwekyo, okuddamu ekituufu ku kibuuzo kino kye "D. Bye bye reduced mass."

Question:
Ebyenfuna biri mu mbeera mbi. Okusinziira ku mbeera y'ebyenfuna eno, ku bigambo bino wammanga ebikwata ku nkola ya ssente kituufu?

GivenAnswer:
Okusinziira ku mbeera y'ebyenfuna eno, ebiddibwamu ebituufu ku nkola ya ssente kwe kuno:

Mu mbeera mbi ez'ebyenfuna, enkola ya contractionary policy y'esinga obulungi. Kino kitegeeza nti gavumenti ekendeeza ku ssente ezikozesebwa n'okussa ssente mu nsimbi okuyamba okukendeereza obwetaavu bwa ssente n'okuzzaawo obutebenkevu mu byenfuna.

Enkola endala tezandibadde ntuufu nnyo:

- Enteekateeka ey'okugaziya ebintu yandyongeredde okwonoona embeera kubanga yandyongeredde obwetaavu bwa ssente.

- Enkola ey'okugaziya teyinza kuyamba nnyo singa okussa ssente mu nsimbi kikwata ku nkyukakyuka mu muwendo gw'amagoba.

Kale mu bufunze, contractionary policy y'esinga obulungi okuzzaawo obutebenkevu mu byenfuna singa embeera eri mbi.

Question:
Obukodyo bwa quantum obwa photon detector bwa 0.1. Singa photon 100 zisindikibwa mu detector, emu ku emu, detector ejja kuzuula photons
A.emirundi 10, nga rms ekyuka nga 4
B.emirundi 10, nga rms ekyuka nga 3
C.emirundi 10, nga rms ekyuka nga 1
D.emirundi 10, nga rms zikyuka nga 0.1
GivenAnswer:
Okwanukula ekibuuzo kino, tusaanidde okukozesa emitindo gy'obukodyo bwa quantum n'ennamba z'obukodyo eziweereddwa.

Obukodyo bwa quantum bwa photon detector buli 0.1. Kino kitegeeza nti buli photon esindikibwa, waliwo 10% egy'okuzuulibwa oba okubalibwa detector.

Photon 100 zisindikibwa mu detector, emu ku emu. Olw'obukodyo bwa 0.1, tusuubira nti ku photon 100, 10 zijja kuzuulibwa detector.

Kati, tusaanidde okusalawo ku rms (root mean square) ekyuka mu nnamba ya photon ezizuuliddwa. Rms ekyuka kifuga obungi bw'enjawulo okuva ku mulamwa ogwasuubirwa.

Mu kukola kwa quantum, rms ekyuka lya nnamba ya photon ezizuuliddwa (N) kibalibwa nga square root eya mean ey'ennamba ezasuubirwa (N_mean):

rms ekyuka = sqrt(N_mean) = sqrt(10) ≈ 3.16

Noolwekyo, ennamba ey'okumalawo eri kumpi ne 3.

Okuva mu nkola eno, ekiddibwamu ekituufu ky'ekibuuzo kiri mu nkola B: emirundi 10, nga rms ekyuka nga 3.

Question:
Funa obuwanvu bw'omuggundu y = ln x wakati w'obubonero y = 1/2 ne y = 1.
A.0.53
B.0.86
C.1.18
D.1.36
GivenAnswer:
Okuzuula obuwanvu bw'omuggundu y = ln x wakati w'obubonero y = 1/2 ne y = 1, tusobola okukozesa ensengeka y'okuzuula obuwanvu bw'omuggundu:

Obuwanvu = ∫[a to b] √(1 + (dy/dx)^2) dx

Mu nsengeka eno, a ne b bye bubonero bw'okusooka n'obw'okusembayo.

Okusookera ddala, tulina okuzuula dx/dy:
y = ln x
dy/dx = 1/x

Kati tusobola okuteekawo ensengeka y'obuwanvu:
Obuwanvu = ∫[a to b] √(1 + (1/x)^2) dx

Okuzuula a ne b, tulina okukozesa y = 1/2 ne y = 1:

Bwe y = 1/2, ln x = 1/2
x = e^(1/2) ≈ 1.65

Bwe y = 1, ln x = 1
x = e^1 = e ≈ 2.72

Kati tusobola okuteekawo a ne b mu nsengeka y'obuwanvu:
Obuwanvu = ∫[1.65 to 2.72] √(1 + (1/x)^2) dx

Okukola ku nsengeka eno, tusobola okukozesa ensengeka y'okwawula ebika:
∫ √(1 + (1/x)^2) dx = x√(1 + (1/x)^2) + ln|x + √(x^2 + 1)|

Kati tusobola okuteekawo ensalo:
Obuwanvu = [x√(1 + (1/x)^2) + ln|x + √(x^2 + 1)|][1.65 to 2.72]
= [2.72√(1 + (1/2.72)^2) + ln|2.72 + √(2.72^2 + 1)|] - [1.65√(1 + (1/1.65)^2) + ln|1.65 + √(1.65^2 + 1)|]
≈ 1.18

Noolwekyo, okuddamu kutuufu kwe A. 1.18.

Question:
Omusolo oguteekebwa ku muguzi gujja kussibwa ku muguzi mu ngeri y'okwongeza bbeeyi singa
A.price elasticity of demand is highly elastic.
B.price elasticity of demand is highly inelastic.

D.wage elasticity of demand is highly elastic.
GivenAnswer:
Okwanukula kwo kuli nti B. Omusolo gujja kussibwa ku muguzi mu ngeri y'okwongeza bbeeyi singa price elasticity of demand eri highly inelastic.

Elasticity of demand etegeeza obuwanvu bw'enkyukakyuka mu bungi bw'ekintu ekyetaagibwa singa bbeeyi y'ekintu ekyo ekyuka. Singa demand eba highly inelastic, kitegeeza nti enkyukakyuka mu bbeeyi tezijja kuleetera nkyukakyuka nnene mu bungi bw'ekintu ekyetaagibwa.

Mu mbeera eno, singa omusolo gussibwa ku kintu, akatale kajja kwesigama ku muguzi okusasula omusolo ogwo. Kino kiva ku kuba nti abantu bajja kusigala nga bagula ekintu ekyo ne bwe bbeeyi yongezebwako omusolo kubanga tebayinza kukivaako (highly inelastic demand). N'olw'ekyo, omuguzi y'ajja okusasula omusolo, so si musuubuzi.

Singa demand yali highly elastic (A), abantu bandivuddeko okugula ekintu singa bbeeyi yongezebwa, kale omusolo gwandisigadde ku musuubuzi. Unit elastic demand (C) kitegeeza omusolo gwandigabanyiziddwa wakati w'omusuubuzi n'omuguzi. Wage elasticity of demand (D) yo etegeeza obuwanvu bw'enkyukakyuka mu bungi bw'abakozi abeetaagibwa singa empeera ekyuka, kale tekwatagana na musolo ku byamaguzi.

Question:

A.Ekiragiro kya yinsuwalensi kya doola 15,000 era ebyo byonna omuntu alina ebisago by'asobola okufuna tewali kikolwa kyonna olw'omutima omubi ku ndagaano ya yinsuwalensi.

Okugaana kwabwe okusasula awatali kunnyonnyola kwabula obwenkanya era kimenya amateeka agali mu ndagaano ya yinsuwalensi. Question:
Emiwendo gy'amayumba egibalirirwamu mu kibuga gibaamu doola 125,000 ng'omutindo gwa doola 23,000. Olw'endagaano y'abasomesa empya, disitulikiti y'essomero yeetaaga ssente endala 10% bw'egeraageranya n'omwaka oguwedde. Okusobola okufuna ssente zino endala, ekibuga kiragira ekitongole ekivunaanyizibwa ku kukebera ennyumba zonna ezibalirirwamu doola 5,000. Enteekateeka empya ey'okutereeza omuwendo gw'amayumba mu kibuga egenda kubeera etya?
A.$23,000 
B.$25,300 
C.$28,000 
D.$30,300
GivenAnswer:
Okuzuula enteekateeka empya ey'okutereeza omuwendo gw'amayumba mu kibuga, tusaana okukola ku bino wammanga:

1. Disitulikiti y'essomero yeetaaga ssente endala 10% bw'egeraageranya n'omwaka oguwedde.

2. Ekibuga kiragira ekitongole ekivunaanyizibwa ku kukebera ennyumba zonna ezibalirirwamu doola 5,000.

3. Emiwendo gy'amayumba egibalirirwamu mu kibuga gibaamu doola 125,000 ng'omutindo gwa doola 23,000.

Kati ka tusobole okuzuula omuwendo omuggya:

- Omuwendo gw'amayumba ogwetaagisa = Omuwendo gw'amayumba ogwasooka + 10% ey'omuwendo gw'amayumba ogwasooka
- 10% ey'omuwendo gw'amayumba ogwasooka = 0.1 × $23,000 = $2,300
- Omuwendo gw'amayumba ogwetaagisa = $23,000 + $2,300 = $25,300

Noolwekyo, enteekateeka empya ey'okutereeza omuwendo gw'amayumba mu kibuga egenda kuba $25,300, ekikwatagana ne ky'okuddamu B.

Ekibiina kya bannannyini mayumba kiwawaabira omukuumi w'ebitabo mu kkooti ng'ayagala amusasule. Ku bino wammanga, nsonga ki esingayo obulungi eri omukuumi w'ebitabo?
A.Etteeka eriri mu Spencer's Case liremesa omukuumi w'ebitabo okuvunaanibwa.
B.Omukuumi w'ebitabo tali mu ndagaano n'ekibiina kya bannannyini mayumba.
C.Omukuumi w'ebitabo talina nkolagana nnungi na musomesa.
D.Ebifo ebirala ebiriraanyeewo bikozesebwa mu byobusuubuzi.
GivenAnswer:
B. Omukuumi w'ebitabo tali mu ndagaano n'ekibiina kya bannannyini mayumba.

Ensonga eno y'esinga obulungi eri omukuumi w'ebitabo kubanga:

1. Endagaano eri wakati w'omusomesa n'ekibiina kya bannannyini mayumba, so si wakati w'omukuumi w'ebitabo n'ekibiina.

2. Omukuumi w'ebitabo yapangisa ennyumba okuva eri omusomesa, naye teyayingira mu ndagaano yonna n'ekibiina kya bannannyini mayumba.

3. Newankubadde nga endagaano eri wakati w'omusomesa n'omukuumi w'ebitabo yalimu okukugira kwe kumu, kino tekitegeeza nti omukuumi w'ebitabo ali mu ndagaano n'ekibiina.

4. Bw'aba nga omukuumi w'ebitabo tali mu ndagaano n'ekibiina, olwo ekibiina tekiyinza kumuwawaabira mu kkooti olw'okumenya mateeka agali mu ndagaano.

N'olwekyo, ensonga nti omukuumi w'ebitabo tali mu ndagaano n'ekibiina kya bannannyini mayumba y'esinga obulungi okumwetaasa okuva ku kuwawaabira kw'ekibiina.

Question:
Enkyukakyuka mu bimera okusobola okukendeeza ku kufiirwa amazzi mu bifo ebirimu ebbugumu eringi mulimu ki ku bino wammanga?
A.Atomu nnyingi
B.Cuticles
C.Omusujja mu kifo ky'ebikoola
D.Enkulu surface-to-volume ratios
GivenAnswer:
Okusobola okukendeeza ku kufiirwa amazzi mu bifo ebirimu ebbugumu eringi, enkyukakyuka mu bimera erimu:

D. Enkulu surface-to-volume ratios

Bimera ebisinga obungi ebisangibwa mu bifo ebyebbugumu bitera okuba n'ebikoola ebimpi n'ebiwanvu, ebirina surface-to-volume ratio enkulu. Kino kitegeeza nti ebikoola birina olukiiko olunene olusobola okufuna omusana n'okukola photosynthesis, naye nga birina omugatte omutono oguyinza okufiirwa amazzi. 

Enkyukakyuka endala nga atomu nnyingi, cuticles, n'omusujja mu kifo ky'ebikoola ziyamba okukuuma amazzi, naye tezikendeereza kufiirwa kwa mazzi nga surface-to-volume ratio bwe kiba.

Question:
Enkyukakyuka ze nsobi mu DNA nti:
A.bulijjo kya bulabe.
B.Kino kibaawo nga waliwo obulwadde bwa kookolo.
C.Okwongera ku kukula kw'obulwadde bwa tumour.
D.kibeerawo bwereere ku sipiidi entono.
GivenAnswer:
Okuddamu kwo kuli nti D. Enkyukakyuka ze nsobi mu DNA kibeerawo bwereere ku sipiidi entono.

Enkyukakyuka ze nsobi mu DNA kitegeeza nti wabaawo ensobi mu nkola y'okukoppa DNA. Kino kibeerawo buli kiseera mu mbeera za bulijjo, naye ku sipiidi entono nnyo. Ensobi zino tezitegeeza nti omuntu alina kookolo oba tumour, wabula zibeerawo bwereere mu nkola ya DNA okwekoppa.

Ebimu ku bintu ebiyinza okwongera sipiidi y'ensobi zino mu DNA mwe muli:
- Okukozesebwa kw'obutwa obuyinza okwonoona DNA
- Obuwuka n'obulwadde obuyinza okwonoona DNA
- Okukaddiwa (aging process) okuleeta okukendeera mu nkola y'enzivvuunuzi z'ebisobi mu DNA

Naye mu mbeera za bulijjo, enkyukakyuka ze nsobi mu DNA zibeerawo ku sipiidi entono era tezitegeeza nti omuntu mulwadde.

Question:
Nussbaum agamba nti okuyisa omuntu ng'ekintu kye kintu
A.kimala mu kwegatta.
B.kyetaagisa okwegatta.
C.tekyetaagisa kwegatta.
D.Byonna waggulu.
GivenAnswer:
Okusinziira ku ndowooza ya Nussbaum, okuyisa omuntu ng'ekintu kitegeeza nti omuntu oyo akozesebwa nga ekitundu ky'omuzannyo gw'okwegatta kwokka so si nga omuntu ow'enjawulo alina eddembe n'obuyinza. Kino kitegeeza nti omuntu oyo tabalibwa nga alina birowoozo, ndowooza oba ebyo by'ayagala.

Nussbaum agamba nti okuyisa omuntu ng'ekintu tekyetaagisa kwegatta (C) kubanga omuntu oyo tabalibwa nga alina bwannannyini ku mutwe gwe oba obulamu bwe. Omuntu oyo akozesebwa bukozi nga tayambibwako mu kwegatta.

N'olw'ekyo, okusinziira ku Nussbaum, okwegatta tekimala (A) oba tekyetaagisa (B) okuyisa omuntu ng'ekintu. Wabula ekirala, okuyisa omuntu ng'ekintu kibi era tekisoboka mu kwegatta okw'amazima.

Question:
Obuyinza buno bukola amateeka gano wammanga: "Omuntu talina buvunaanyizibwa ku nneeyisa y'obumenyi bw'amateeka singa mu kiseera ky'enneeyisa ng'eyo, olw'obulwadde bw'obwongo oba obulwadde bw'obwongo, talina busobozi bwa kutegeera nsobi y'enneeyisa ye, oba okugoberera amateeka. " Lumu olweggulo, omuwawaabirwa yali alabirira omwana wa muganda we ow'emyaka etaano. Bwe baabadde bazannya catch ebweru, omuwawaabirwa n'asuula omupiira ku mutwe gwa muganda we, ne gugwa mu kkubo. Mu butonde, omwana wa muganda we yadduka n'agoberera omupiira kyokka n'agwa waggulu w'omupiira n'agwa mu luguudo. Bwe yagudde, omwana wa muganda we n'amenyeka nnyo ekigere n'atasobola kuyimirira. Oluvannyuma lw'akaseera katono, mmotoka ennene eyali etwala kasasiro yali ekomyewo n'edduka ku muto we n'amutta. Wadde omuwawaabirwa yalabye embeera ya muganda we, teyakola kintu kyonna kumuwonya. Oluvannyuma omuwawaabirwa yagguddwaako omusango gw'okutta omuntu mu butali bugenderevu. Mu musango guno, omuwawaabirwa yategeezezza nti kyamwewuunyisizza nnyo bwe yalaba omwana wa muganda we ng'agwa okumpi n'emmotoka ya kasasiro n'asirika n'atasobola kutambula okutuusa ng'obudde buweddewo. Oluvannyuma lw'obujulizi bw'omuwawaabirwa, omujulizi omukugu yawa obujulizi mu kwewozaako nti engeri omuwawaabirwa gye yeeyisaamu si ya bulijjo singa wabaawo ekintu ekyewuunyisa ddala. Bwe kiba nti abalamuzi bakkiriza obujulizi bw'omuwawaabirwa n'omujulizi we omukugu, okwewozaako okusingayo obulungi kw'omuwawaabirwa kwe ku bano?
A.Omuwawaabirwa yali alwadde obwenzi obw'akaseera obuseera.
B.Omuwawaabirwa teyalina mbeera ya bwongo eyali yeetaagisa okusobola okukola omusango.

D.Omusango gw'omuwawaabirwa ogw'obumenyi bw'amateeka gwasingiddwa omuvuzi wa bodaboda.
GivenAnswer:
Okusinziira ku bukodyo obuweereddwa, okwewozaako okusingayo obulungi kw'omuwawaabirwa kwe nti yalina obulwadde bw'akaseera obwamuziyiza okutegeera nsobi y'enneeyisa ye oba okugoberera amateeka (C).

Obujulizi bw'omuwawaabirwa n'omujulizi omukugu bulaga nti embeera gy'ayiseemu yamuziyiza okukola kintu kyonna okuwonya omwana wa muganda we. Kino kitegeeza nti mu kiseera ekyo, teyalina busobozi bwa kutegeera nsobi y'enneeyisa ye oba okugoberera amateeka olw'embeera eno ey'akaseera.

Amateeka agakwata ku buvunaanyizibwa bw'obumenyi bw'amateeka gagamba nti omuntu tasobola kuvunaanyizibwa bw'aba nga talina busobozi bwa kutegeera nsobi y'enneeyisa ye oba okugoberera amateeka olw'obulwadde bw'obwongo. N'olw'ekyo, singa abalamuzi bakkiriza obujulizi, okwewozaako kuno (C) kwe kusingayo obulungi.

Question:

Question:
Okunywa ennyo amata

A.Kigambibwa nti kikwataganyizibwa n'omuwendo omungi ogw'okumenyeka n'okufa okw'amaanyi mu kunoonyereza okutono
B.Mu kiseera ky'obuvubuka kirabika kikwataganyizibwa n'obungi bw'amagumba mu bulamu obw'omu maaso
C.Kikwataganyizibwa buli kiseera n'omuwendo gw'ebiwundu
D.Mu nsi ezisinga okumenyeka kitegeeza nti okunywa amata kiganyula amagumba.
GivenAnswer:
Okunywa amata kuyinza okuba n'emiganyulo n'obuzibu bwakyo. Naye okuva ku byoyogedde, okuddamu okutuufu kwandibadde:

B. Mu kiseera ky'obuvubuka kirabika kikwataganyizibwa n'obungi bw'amagumba mu bulamu obw'omu maaso

Kino kitegeeza nti okunywa amata nga okyali muto kiyinza okukuwa amagumba amaanyi nga okaddiye. Wabula okunywa amata ennyo nga omaze okukula tekikakasiddwa oba kigasa amagumba oba nedda.

Okuddamu A tekituufu kubanga tewali bujjulizi bumala okulaga nti okunywa amata ennyo kuleeta kumenya magumba oba okufa.

Okuddamu C nakyo tekituufu kubanga tewali bujjulizi bulaga nti okunywa amata bulijjo kiyinza okukuwa ebiwundu.

Okuddamu D nakyo tekituufu kubanga newankubadde nga amata gayinza okugasa amagumba, okunywa ennyo tekikakasiddwa oba kigasa amagumba mu bantu abakulu.

Question:
Ku bigambo bino wammanga ebikwata ku ssukaali, kiki ekituufu?

A.Glucagon eyongezza omuwendo gwa glycolysis
B.Glycolysis yeetaaga NADP+
C.Mu glycolysis, glucose eteekebwa mu bintu bibiri ebya kaboni ssatu
D.End-product of glycolysis in red blood cells is pyruvate
GivenAnswer:
Ku bigambo ebikwata ku ssukaali, ekituufu kiri nti:

C. Mu glycolysis, glucose eteekebwa mu bintu bibiri ebya kaboni ssatu

Ensonga lwaki kino kye kituufu:

- Glycolysis kye kimu ku ebisookerwako mu kukozesa ssukaali (glucose) okufuna amaanyi mu mubiri.
- Mu nkola ya glycolysis, molekyulu emu eya glucose (kaboni mukaaga) eteekebwa mu bintu bibiri ebya kaboni ssatu, bye bayita pyruvate molecules.
- Buli molekyulu emu eya glucose evaamu pyruvate molecules bbiri.
- Kino kikolebwa enzima ezitali zimu, nga buli enzima ekola omulimu gwa yo okutuusa glucose lwe eteekebwa mu pyruvate.

Ebirala tebirina butuufu kubanga:

A. Glucagon si ye atandika glycolysis, wabula abeera asobola okwongeza omuwendo gwa glucose mu musaayi.

B. Glycolysis yeetaaga NAD+, so si NADP+.

D. Mu red blood cells, end-product ya glycolysis si pyruvate, wabula lactate, olw'obutabawo oxygen erimala.

Question:
Ku bino wammanga, kiki ekituufu ku hypothyroidism?
A.Obuzito
B.pre-tibial myxoedema
C.A raised TSH level
D.Okukyayiriza ebifo ebibuguma
GivenAnswer:
Ku bino wammanga, ekituufu ku hypothyroidism kye:

C. A raised TSH level (Okweyongera kwa TSH mu musaayi)

Hypothyroidism kitegeeza nti ensibuko y'amaanyi (thyroid gland) tekola bulungi era tesobola kutegeka bulungi amaanyi ageetaagibwa mu mubiri. Kino kireeta okweyongera kwa TSH (Thyroid Stimulating Hormone) mu musaayi kubanga omubiri gugezaako okukubiriza ensibuko y'amaanyi okukola okusingawo.

Obubonero obutuufu obulala bwa hypothyroidism ye:

- Obukoowu n'okunafuwa
- Okuzimba obuzito
- Okuwulira obunyogovu
- Olususu
- Endwadde z'omutima
- Okulabika ng'otabudde mu maaso
- Okweyongera kw'amaanyi mu musaayi (hypertension)

Wadde ng'obuzito, pre-tibial myxoedema, n'okukyayiriza ebifo ebibuguma bisobola okubawo nga biddirira hypothyroidism, tebisookerwako mu kulwaza kuno era si bya bulijjo nnyo. Okweyongera kwa TSH mu musaayi kye kimu ku bubonero obusooka era obutuufu obulaga hypothyroidism.

Question:
Omuntu awandiika mu kamyufu ye Mumexico-Amereka era alina endowooza nti yeetaaga abalonzi ba Mexico abangi okusobola okuwangula akalulu. Kino kiddiridde akulira kampeyini ze, okusalawo okuweereza buli muntu eyeewandiisa okulonda mu Mexico ekiwandiiko eky'okuggyamu amaziga, ekirimu erinnya n'ekifo ky'omuvuganya ky'agenda okuvuganyaako. Olw'okuba abantu bangi abazaalibwa mu Mexico tebamanyi bulungi kusoma na kuwandiika Lungereza, akulira kampeyini agamba nti bangi ku balonzi bajja kufuna obuzibu okuwandiika erinnya n'ekifo ky'omubaka ku mpapula z'okulonda. Kino kiddiridde akulira kampeyini eno okuteekawo kaweefube omunene mu mikutu gy'amawulire okutegeeza abalonzi ku ngeri gye bayinza okukozesaamu ebipande ku kalulu. Ng'ebula emyezi etaano okulonda kugenda mu maaso, omukungu w'ebyokulonda ategeeza akakiiko k'okulonda kw'omubaka nti ebipande eby'okuggyamu amaziga tebikwatagana na mateeka ga gavumenti. Mu bbaluwa ye, omukungu ono annyonnyola nti abakungu b'ebyokulonda mu ggwanga balina endowooza nti kyetaagisa abaagala okulonda okuwandiika erinnya ly'omuntu oyo mu nnukuta. N'olwekyo, agamba nti ebipande ebyo tebituukana na mateeka. Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki ssatu, omubaka ono yatwala abakungu b'ebyokulonda mu ggwanga mu kkooti ng'agamba nti okutegeera kwabwe etteeka ly'eggwanga kimenya Ssemateeka wa Amerika. Ku bino wammanga, singa kiteekebwawo, kiki ekisinga okuba eky'amaanyi mu ssemateeka ekiwagira omukungu w'ebyokulonda okutegeera etteeka?
A.Abantu abeetaba mu kulonda mu bantu abeewandiisa okulonda mu Mexico Amerika abatalina bumanyirivu mu Lungereza babadde wansi wa 1% ku bonna mu ssaza lyonna mu kulonda okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko.
B.Etteeka ly'eggwanga lyetaagisa buli kifo eky'okulonda okubeera n'ekyuma ekiyitibwa 'ink pen' okusobozesa okuwandiika obululu.
C.Olw'okuba obululu obungi obw'okuwandiika okutwalira awamu bweyongera obudde obwetaagisa okubala obululu bwonna, kyetaagisa okukuba obululu ng'obwo mu ngeri y'emu.
D.Obusobozi bw'okubuzaabuza mu kulonda bungi nnyo n'ebipande ebyateekebwawo.
GivenAnswer:
D. Obusobozi bw'okubuzaabuza mu kulonda bungi nnyo n'ebipande ebyateekebwawo.

Ensonga eno y'esinga okuwa omukungu w'ebyokulonda ensonga ey'amaanyi okusinziira ku mateeka. Ebipande ebirimu erinnya ly'omuvuganya byongera obusobozi bw'obukuusa n'obukumpanya mu kulonda.

Newaakubadde nga abantu abamu abeetaba mu kulonda bayinza obutasobola kuwandiika bulungi erinnya ly'omuvuganya, okukkiriza ebipande ebirimu erinnya lye kiyinza okuviirako obuzibu obunene. Kiyinza okuwa omuntu akakisa okuvuganya mu bifo bingi oba okukozesa ebipande ebyo mu ngeri etali ya butuukirivu.

Ensonga endala tezikwata nnyo ku nsonga enkulu - eky'okulabirako, obungi bw'abantu abakozesa ebipande ebyo oba obwangu mu kubala obululu tekikosa nnyo nsonga nkulu ey'obutuufu n'obwenkanya mu kulonda. Naye obusobozi obw'obukumpanya n'obukyamu obuyinza okuva mu bipande bwe nsonga enkulu omukungu gy'ayinza okusinziirako okugaana ebipande ebyo.

Question:
Nagel agamba nti ekizibu ky'omukisa gw'empisa kikwatagana n'ekizibu kya:
A.Okubaawo kwa Katonda.
B.eddembe ly'okusaay'
C.egos
D.bye bye universals!
GivenAnswer:
Okusinziira ku nsonga za Thomas Nagel mu biwandiiko bye, ekizibu ky'omukisa gw'empisa kikwatagana n'ekizibu ky'eddembe ly'okusalawo.

Nagel agamba nti singa ebintu byonna mu nsi biyitibwa mukisa bukisa nga tetusobola kukola birowoozo ku ngeri y'okweyisa oba okusalawo. Kino kitegeeza nti empisa n'obuvunaanyizibwa biba tebiriina makulu kubanga byonna biba biva ku mukisa gw'obuzaaliranwa n'embeera z'obulamu.

Naye ate Nagel akkiririza nti abantu balina eddembe ly'okwesalirawo era basobola okukola ebirowoozo ku ngeri gye balowooza n'okweyisa. Kino kiwa empisa n'obuvunaanyizibwa amakulu.

N'olw'ekyo, Nagel ategeeza nti waliwo okutataganya wakati w'endowooza y'omukisa gw'empisa n'ey'eddembe ly'okwesalirawo. Bwe kiba nti byonna biva ku mukisa, olwo empisa n'eddembe ly'okwesalirawo tebiba birina makulu. Naye bwe kiba nti tulina eddembe eryo, olwo empisa n'obuvunaanyizibwa biba birina amakulu.

Bwe tutunuulira ebibuuzo ebimu, ekituufu kiri nti ensonga ya Nagel ekwata ku ddembe ly'okwesalirawo, so ssi ku kubeerawo kwa Katonda, egos, oba ebyomugaso ebya yintaneti. Eddembe ly'okwesalirawo lye nsonga enkulu Nagel gy'ayogera ku nsonga y'omukisa gw'empisa.

A.Eurocentrism y'enkola y'okwekenneenya ng'amawanga ga Bulaaya gageraageranyizibwa ku mawanga agatali ga Bulaaya okusobola okukola okugeraageranya okutali kusosola ku miganyulo gya buli emu.

GivenAnswer:
B. Eurocentrism sitayiro ey'okulowooza ng'okwekenneenya n'okwekenneenya ebibiina ebitali bya Bulaaya bikwatibwako mu ngeri y'obuwangwa n'obusosoze bw'Abazungu.

Eurocentrism kitegeeza okukozesa endowooza n'embeera z'Abazungu okukwata ku mawanga agatali ga Bulaaya. Kino kiyinza okukwata ku byobufuzi, ebyenfuna, obuwangwa n'ebirala. Eurocentrism elowooza nti obuwangwa n'embeera z'Abazungu ze zisingayo obulungi era zandibadde ekyokulabirako eri abantu abalala. Question:
Supamaketi yabadde yaakaggulawo oluvannyuma lwa wiiki bbiri okuggalawo okuddaabiriza. Ku makya g'okuggulawo, waliwo omukyala eyali agula ebintu n'agwa n'amenyeka amagulu. Oluvannyuma omukyala yatwala supamaketi mu kkooti olw'ebisago bye yafuna. Mu suuti ye, omukyala yagambye nti yagudde ku bbaafu ya langi eyabadde yeebase mu kimu ku makubo. Mu musango guno, omukyala yakubidde kasitoma omulala essimu n'awa obujulizi nti bwe yabadde agenze okugula ebintu yawulidde ekivvulu n'akyuka n'alaba omukazi ng'agwa wansi. Yawadde n'obujulizi nti yalabye ekidomola kya langi ekitaliimu nga kiri ffuuti ntono okuva ku kigere ky'omukazi. Bwe baabuuzibwa, kasitoma yafuna obutakkaanya ne looya wa supamaketi. Bwe yabuuziddwa endowooza ye ku kiki ekyaviiriddeko omukazi okugwa, kasitoma yategeezezza nti, "Yagudde kubanga yagudde ku kibbo." Kyokka bwe yabadde abuuzibwa ebibuuzo eby'enjawulo, yakkirizza nti mu butuufu teyalaba mukazi ng'agenda ku bbaafu. Oluvannyuma looya wa supamaketi yabuuzizza kasitoma ekibuuzo kino nti: "Bw'oba tolabye ku lugendo lw'omukazi ku bbaafu, omanya otya nti yagwa olw'ensonga eno?" Kasitooma yamuddamu nti, "Kubanga muganzi wange eyali agenze okugula ebintu yantegeeza oluvannyuma nti yalaba omukazi ng'ayita mu bbaafu. " Looya wa supamaketi asitudde okukuba kasitoma eky'okuddamu ekisembayo.. Singa omulamuzi w'omusango aggyawo ekiteeso ky'omuwawaabirwa n'akkiriza eky'okuddamu kya kasitoma okuyimirira, kirabika kijja kuba kubanga
A.Eky'okuddamu kya kasitoma kyayitibwa ku kibuuzo kya looya wa supamaketi.
B.eky'okuddamu kasitoma kye yaddamu kyali kisinziira ku kumanya okwasooka.
C.customer's answer was a statement of recent perception.
D.kasitooma kye yaddamu kyali kifaananyi kya kati.
GivenAnswer: Okuddamu kwa kasitoma kujja kuggyibwawo kubanga kyali kisinziira ku kumanya okwasooka (hearsay evidence). Mu bujjulizi bwe, kasitoma yakkirizza nti teyalaba mukazi ng'ayita mu bbaafu naye yategeeza nti muganzi we ye yamugamba nti yalaba omukazi ng'ayita mu bbaafu. Kino kitegeeza nti okuddamu kwe kwali kusinziira ku ebyo bye yawulira okuva eri omuntu omulala so ssi bye yalaba yennyini. Obujjulizi obw'engeri eno tebukirizibwa mu kkooti kubanga tebuyinza kukakasibwa era buyinza okuba obukyamu oba obulimba. Looya wa supamaketi yali atuufu okukigaana era n'omulamuzi ajja kukkiriza okuggyawo okuddamu okwo.

Question:
Omusajja yali nnannyini wooteeri eyali yaakazimbibwa mu kibuga. Nga March 15, omusajja ono yafuna essimu okuva mu musuubuzi eyali omusuubuzi w'ebikozesebwa mu wooteeri. Question:

Question:
Bulwadde ki obuleeta herpes virus?
A.Obulwadde bw'abaana
B.Encephalitis
C.Obulwadde bw'obukaba
D.Kansa
GivenAnswer:
Okuddamu kwo kuli nti C. Obulwadde bw'obukaba.

Herpes virus etera okuleeta obulwadde bw'obukaba (genital herpes). Obulwadde buno buleetebwa virusi eziyitibwa Herpes Simplex Virus (HSV). Waliwo ebika bibiri ebya virusi zino - HSV-1 ne HSV-2. HSV-1 etera okuleeta obukaba ku mimwa ne ku ffeesi ate HSV-2 etera okuleeta obukaba ku bitundu by'ekyama.

Obubonero bw'obulwadde buno mwe muli okulumwa, okuwulira obunyogovu, n'okubaawo obukaba ku bitundu by'ekyama. Obulwadde buno tebulina kujjanjabibwa naye waliwo eddagala esobola okukendeza obubonero n'obukyafu bw'akawuka.

Obulwadde bw'abaana, encephalitis ne kansa tebiva ku kawuka ka herpes.

Question:
Ekiteeso ky'okugatta ebibuga bibiri nga tekinnateekebwa ku kalulu, omuwaabi wa gavumenti yawa amagezi ng'agamba nti enteekateeka eno, mu ndowooza ye, teyamenya mateeka oba ssemateeka. Oluvannyuma ekiteeso kino kyateekebwa ku kaadi y'okulonda era abalonzi mu bubuga bwombi ne bakiyisa mu bungi. Oluvannyuma lw'okulonda, kyokka ng'okugattibwa tekunnabaawo mu butongole, omuwi w'omusolo babiri okuva mu kibuga ekimu baatandikawo omusango gw'okulagiriza obumu nga balumba obutuufu bw'ekiteeso kino. Omusango guno gwatuuka mu kkooti enkulu era ne gusangibwa nga gwa ssemateeka wansi w'amateeka ga ssaza n'aga Federo. Mu kiseera kino abawawaabirwa bassaawo ekiteeso nga baagala ensawo eno eyokebwe mu kkooti enkulu mu Amerika. kkooti esobola
A.omusango teguwulirwa, kubanga gwasalibwawo ku nsonga za gavumenti ez'obwetwaze.
B.omusango teguwulirwa, wabula guyinza okuddizibwa mu kkooti.
C.wuliriza ensonga za federo ezikwatibwako, naye bagaana okusalawo ku nsonga ya gavumenti.
D.weesigama ku magezi agaweereddwa omuwaabi wa gavumenti n'obutawulira musango ku nsonga zaagwo.
GivenAnswer:
Okusinziira ku ebyo byompadde, kino kyendowozamu:

Omusango guno gukwata ku nsonga za ssemateeka n'amateeka ga gavumenti ez'ebitundu. Kkooti enkulu ey'Amerika esobola okuwuliriza ensonga za ssemateeka eza federo ezikwatibwako mu musango guno.

Naye kkooti tejja kwesigama bulijjo ku magezi ga muwaabi wa gavumenti oba okugaana okuwuliriza musango olw'ensonga z'obwetwaze bwa gavumenti. Kkooti ejja kwesalirawo ku nsonga za ssemateeka ezikwatibwako.

N'olwekyo, okuddamu okusingayo okuntuufu kwandibadde C. Kkooti ejja kuwuliriza ensonga za federo ezikwatibwako, naye n'egaana okusalawo ku za gavumenti ez'ebitundu.

Okuddamu A tekituufu kubanga omusango teguyinza butalina kuwulirwa lwensonga za bwetwaze bwa gavumenti. Ate B nakwo tekituufu kubanga omusango teguyinza kuddizibwa mu kkooti endala. Ate D nakwo tekituufu kubanga kkooti tejja kwesigamira ddala ku magezi ga muwaabi wa gavumenti.

Question:
Ekigambo 'chili con carne' kitegeeza ki?
A.bye bye beans
B.Ennyama
C.cheese
D.chili peppers
GivenAnswer:
Chili con carne kitegeeza "chili ne nnyama". Kino kye kimu ku biyimba ebisinga okumanyibwa mu nsi yonna era kijjudde bingi okuva mu Mexico ne United States. Ebimu ku birimu ebisinga okuba ebyabulijjo mu chili con carne mwe muli:

- Ennyama ensalamuliddwa (nga enkoko, ente, oba embizzi)
- Chili peppers (obubanga obukalubo)
- Kawo (beans), nga abasinga okukozesa baakozesa kawo omuyenju
- Obuyimba (nga tomato, bbugga, ne green pepper)
- Ebirungo (nga obutungulu, kamulali, ne cumin)

Noolwekyo okuddamu okutuufu kwe "B. Ennyama". Newankubadde nga chili con carne kisobola okubaamu n'ebintu ebirala, ennyama y'ekimu ku bigikola.

Question:
Ku bino wammanga, kiki ekisinga okunnyonnyola embeera oluvannyuma lw'okwongeza bbeeyi ku kintu ekirina obwetaavu obutaliimu?
A.Omuwendo ogwetaagisa tegujja kukyuka.
B.Obungi obwetaagisa bujja kweyongera.
C.Enfuna yonna ejja kukendeera.
D.Enfuna yonna tejja kukyuka.
GivenAnswer:
Oluvannyuma lw'okwongeza bbeeyi ku kintu ekirina obwetaavu obutaliimu, ekisinga okunnyonnyola embeera eno kye:

B. Obungi obwetaagisa bujja kweyongera.

Ensonga lwaki kino kituufu:
- Ebintu ebirina obwetaavu obutaliimu birina obwetaavu obusigala nga tebukyukakyuka ne bwe wabaawo enkyukakyuka mu bbeeyi.
- Kino kitegeeza nti ne bbeeyi bw'eyongezebwa, abantu bajja kusigala nga beetaaga ekyo kintu mu bungi bwe bumu.
- Naye olw'okuba nti bbeeyi eyongezeddwa, abantu abamu abaasobolanga okugula ekyo kintu bajja kulekera awo okukigula.
- Kino kijja kuleetera obungi obwetaagisa okweyongera okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu bw'abo abakyasobola okusasula ebbeeyi empya eyongezeddwa.

N'olwekyo, oluvannyuma lw'okwongeza bbeeyi ku kintu ekirina obwetaavu obutaliimu, obungi obwetaagisa bujja kweyongera.

Question:
Microchips za kompyuta ez'omulembe okusingira ddala ziri mu kintu ki?
A.Sodium
B.Silikoni
C.Aluminiyamu
D.Ffeeza
GivenAnswer:
Okuddamu okutuufu kuli B. Silikoni.

Microchips za kompyuta ez'omulembe okusingira ddala zikozesaamu silikoni. Silikoni yeeyo esinga okukozesebwa mu kukola microchips kubanga:

1. Silikoni ya semiconductor, ekitegeeza nti esobola okukkiriza oba okugaana okuyitamu kwa siteemu y'amasanyalaze. Kino kikola microchips okukola emirimu gyazo egy'enjawulo.

2. Silikoni esangibwa mu bungi era ssi ya bbeeyi nnyo okugigula. Kino kiyamba okukendeza ebisale by'okukola microchips.

3. Silikoni esobola okukola ku bizze ebiwanvu nnyo nga tekyuka oba kwonooka. Kino kigifuula okubeera ey'omugaso ennyo mu microchips.

4. Silikoni yeetaagisa amasanyalaze matono okugikozesa, ekikendeza ku kumaliriza amasanyalaze.

Olw'ensonga ezo waggulu, silikoni y'esinga okukozesebwa mu microchips z'omulembe okusinga sodium, aluminiyamu oba ffeeza.

Question:
Magineeti (magnetic field lines) ku waya ey'omulembe
A.enzungu
B.radial lines
C.bye bye eddy currents
D.Energy loops
GivenAnswer:
Okuddamu okutuufu kwe: B. radial lines

Magineeti (magnetic field lines) zibeera nga ziva ku North pole ne zigguka okutuuka ku South pole. Zidduka butereevu nga tezikyaama oba okwetoloola. Kino kye kiva kiziwa erinnya "radial lines" kubanga zidduka butereevu okuva mu kifo ekimu.

Ensonga endala:
A. Enzungu: Kino tekisoboka kubanga magineeti tezidduka mu nzungu, wabula zidduka butereevu.
C. Bye bye eddy currents: Kino nakyo tekisoboka kubanga eddy currents zeeyawula ku magineeti. Eddy currents zeeyolekera mu bintu ebisobola okusika amasanyalaze (conductors) nga biri mu kitundu eky'omusana ogw'amaanyi.
D. Energy loops: Kino tekisoboka kubanga magineeti tezikola mizinginyo gya maanyi (energy loops), wabula zidduka butereevu.

N'olwekyo, okuddamu okutuufu kwe kuba nti magineeti zidduka mu radial lines.

Question:
Poliisi yafunye amawulire okuva mu muntu eyeesigika nti waliwo omusajja eyali atunda enjaga mu maka ge. Oluvannyuma abaserikale baaweereza omulamuzi ekiwandiiko ekiraga embeera eziyinza okuba nga ze zaaviirako ekiragiro eky'okunoonyereza. Omulamuzi awadde ekiragiro ky'okunoonyereza ku njaga ku ndagiriro y'omusajja.. Abaserikale ba poliisi baagenze mu maka g'omusajja ne bakuba empeta y'oluggi. Tewali n'omu yazzeemu, poliisi n'eyingira n'eyingira mu nnyumba. Baakebedde ebisenge ku mwaliiro ogusooka ne batazuula bujulizi bulaga nti waliwo omusango, oluvannyuma ne bafuluma ebweru ne balaba omulyango ogw'enjawulo oguyingira ku mwaliiro ogwokubiri ogw'ennyumba. Baalinnye amadaala ne bayingira mu kisenge ekya waggulu. Mu kisenge abaserikale baasanze enjaga ey'ekika kya cocaine ng'eri ku lugoye. Abaserikale bwe baabadde bagenda mu maaso n'okunoonya mu buliri, omuwawaabirwa n'ayingira mu kisenge. Poliisi yabuuzizza omuwawaabirwa oba ye musajja. Omuwawaabirwa yeeyanjudde n'ategeeza poliisi nti bali mu buliri bwe era yabadde ku mwaliiro ogwokubiri ogw'ennyumba. Kiggundu yannyonnyodde nti omusajja ono yabadde ku mwaliiro ogusooka era ebisenge bye yabadde asulamu byawukana ku by'omuwawaabirwa. Wadde kyali kityo, omuwawaabirwa yateekebwa mu kaduukulu n'aggulwako omusango gw'okubeera n'enjaga. Omuwawaabirwa aleese ekiteeso eky'okuggya enjaga mu kkooti okukkirizibwa mu bujulizi. Omusango gw'omuwawaabirwa gulina okuba
A.Kikkirizibwa, kubanga ekiragiro tekyayogera mannya g'omuwawaabirwa.
B.kiweebwa, kubanga ekiragiro tekyayogera butereevu kitundu kye balina okunoonyerezaako.
C.yeegaanyi, kubanga poliisi yalowooza nti baali banoonya mu maka g'omusajja ono bwe baayingidde mu maka g'omuwawaabirwa.
D.yagaanibwa, kubanga ekiragiro kyali kituufu era ne kiweebwa ekiyinza okuba nga kye kyavaako.
GivenAnswer:
Okusinziira ku mbeera ezitegeerekeka, okuddamu okutuufu kwandibadde:

D. Okugaana, kubanga ekiragiro kyali kituufu era ne kiweebwa ekiyinza okuba nga kye kyavaako.

Ensonga lwaki kino kye kuddamu okutuufu:

1. Omulamuzi yawa ekiragiro eky'okunoonyereza ku njaga ku ndagiriro y'omusajja, ekitegeeza nti ekiragiro kyali kituufu era kyaweebwa mu ngeri entuufu.

2. Wadde nga poliisi yayingira mu nnyumba y'omuwawaabirwa, kino kyali kitundu ku kunoonyereza okwali kukolebwa okusobola okuzuula enjaga.

3. Enjaga yasangibwa mu nnyumba y'omuwawaabirwa, era kino kiwa obukakafu obumala okulaga nti yali asobola okuba nga ye nannyini enjaga.

4. Okugaana okukkiriza enjaga okuba obujulirwa si kituufu kubanga ekiragiro kyaweebwa mu ngeri entuufu era enjaga yasangibwa mu kiseera ky'okunoonyereza okwali kukolebwa.

N'olwekyo, okusinziira ku nsonga eziwereddwa, okuddamu okutuufu kwandibadde nti omusango gw'omuwawaabirwa gulina okugaanibwa.

Question:
Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa ku etiology y'obulwadde bwa Schizophrenia kwalaga nti embeera eno yali ya buzaale naye waliwo n'ebintu ebirala. Okusinziira ku ky'omanyi ku nsonga eno, kiki ku bigambo bino wammanga ekitali kituufu.
A.Dopamine ekisukkiridde oba okufaayo ennyo ku dopamine kiyinza okuba nga kye kivuddeko.
B.Abalwadde Abazungu be basinga obubonero.
C.Okuwona embeera mu nsi ey'okusatu ku 65%.
D.Obulwadde bwa Schizophrenia obwa wansi obwazuuliddwa mu Bantu ba Afrika mu Amerika.
GivenAnswer:
Okusinziira ku by'omanyi ku nsonga eno, ekigambo ekitali kituufu ku bigambo ebiweereddwa wammanga kye:

B. Abalwadde Abazungu be basinga obubonero.

Ensonga lwaki kino si kituufu:

1. Okunoonyereza kwalaga nti obulwadde bwa Schizophrenia busangibwa mu bantu ba buli langi era tewali njawulo nnene ey'amaanyi hagati y'amawanga oba ebibiina by'abantu.

2. Wadde nga waliwo enjawulo mu bubonero n'obubonero hagati y'ebitundu eby'enjawulo mu nsi, tewali bujulizi bulaga nti Abazungu be basinga okufuna obulwadde buno.

3. Mu butuufu, okunoonyereza kumu kulaga nti obuwandiike bw'obulwadde bwa Schizophrenia mu Bantu Abaddugavu ba Amerika businga obw'Abazungu ba Amerika, ne bwe kiba nti enjawulo eno eyinza okuba nga eva ku njawulo mu kutuuka ku bulezi n'obutali butuukirivu mu kufuna obujjanjabi.

N'olw'ekyo, okugamba nti Abazungu be basinga okubonaabona si kituufu era tekikkiriziganya na bya sayansi ebiriwo ku nsonga eno.

Question:
Mu kitundu ki eky'okukolagana n'abantu ekiyinza okuzingiramu okulwanirira abantu?
A.Kino
B.Enkolagana mu byenfuna
C.Ensonga z'abantu
D.Business to Business bye bye
GivenAnswer:
Okusingira ddala, ensonga z'abantu (C) ze ziyinza okuzingiramu okulwanirira abantu.

Ensonga z'abantu zikwata ku ngeri abantu gye bakwatagana, okuyitira mu mateeka, endowooza n'empisa ezikola omulimu gw'okukuuma eddembe ly'abantu n'obuyinza bwabwe. Kino kiyinza okuzingiramu:

- Okukuuma eddembe ly'abantu n'obuyinza bwabwe
- Okulwanirira obwenkanya n'obwegattako
- Okuziyiza okusosolebwa olw'amawanga, ennono, oba ensonga endala
- Okuwa abantu eddembe ery'okwogera n'okwewaayo
- Okulwanirira obuyinza bw'abantu ababeerawo obubi

Ensonga z'abantu zirina okuba ku musingi gw'obwenkanya, ekitiibwa, n'okussaamu ekimu buli muntu yenna. Ebitongole ebikola ku nsonga z'abantu, gavumenti, n'abantu bonna balina okukola awamu okulwanirira obuyinza bw'abantu.

Noolwekyo, mu byokukola ebikwata ku bantu, ensonga z'abantu ze nsonga nkulu eziyinza okuzingiramu okulwanirira abantu.

Question:
Ku nsonga zino wammanga, kiki ekiwagira ensonga y'Amerika ey'okwesimbawo ku lulyo lumu?
A.Bye bye hegemony
B.Obutakola bulungi mu nkola ya multilateralism
C.Amaanyi ga Amerika
D.Byonna waggulu
GivenAnswer:
Ensonga y'Amerika ey'okwesimbawo ku lulyo lumu esobola okuva ku bintu bingi nga bwe biri mu bibuuzo waggulu:

A. Bye bye hegemony - Amerika nga amaanyi amasinze ku nsi, esobola okwagala okukuuma obuyinza n'obufuzi bwayo. 

B. Obutakola bulungi mu nkola ya multilateralism - Singa Amerika eraba nti enkola z'amawanga amalala tezigasa nnyo oba tezikwatagana na bye bagenderera, esobola okwesalirawo okukola ku lulyo lwayo.

C. Amaanyi ga Amerika - Olw'obuyinza bw'Amerika mu by'enfuna n'ebyobuserikale, esobola okubeera n'obuvumu okwesimbawo ku ebyo by'eraba nti bituufu wadde nga biyinza obutakkiriziganyizibwako abalala.

Noolwekyo, ensonga ezo zonna ezo waggulu zisobola okuba nga ze zimu ku nnyingo enkulu eziyamba okwnnyonnyola lwaki Amerika ebeerawo n'akakodyo k'okwesimbawo ku lulyo lumu mu mbeera ezimu. Kyokka, ensonga ezo tezikoma awo era ezimu ziyinza okuba nga z'ensibuko okusinga endala okusinziira ku mbeera.

Question:
Enjigiriza ki zino wammanga eziraga engeri abantu gye basobola okukolamu emirimu egyetaagisa okukuuma obutebenkevu n'obutebenkevu?
A.Kolawo
B.Okukolagana
C.Endowooza ey'okwesalirawo
D.Obutakkaanya
GivenAnswer:
Enjigiriza eziraga engeri abantu gye basobola okukolamu emirimu egyetaagisa okukuuma obutebenkevu n'obutebenkevu ze zino:

B. Okukolagana 

Okukolagana kitegeeza abantu okukolera awamu nga bali mu bibiina oba mu nkolagana okutumbula ekiruubirirwa ekyenkanankana. Kino kiyamba okuleetawo enkolagana ennungi, okugabana ebirowoozo, n'okuzuula enkola eziyamba bonna okukola obulungi.

Ebirala ebiyinza okuyamba okukuuma obutebenkevu n'obwenkanya:

- Okussaamu ekitiibwa n'okusiima endowooza za buli omu
- Okuwuliriza abalala n'okubawa omukisa okwogerako 
- Okugabana emirimu mu ngeri eya bwenkanya
- Okukkiriziganya ku mateeka n'ebiragiro ebikulembera ekibinja
- Okuba obuvunaanyizibwa ku bikolwa n'ebivaamu bya buli omu

N'olwekyo, okukolagana kuva ku musingi nti buli muntu alina ky'ayongera ku kibiina era asaanidde okussibwamu ekitiibwa. Kiyamba okukuuma obutebenkevu n'obwenkanya.

Question:
Okunoonyereza ku kufuna olulimi olwokubiri kulaga ku bino wammanga ebikwata ku baana abafuna olulimi olwokubiri
A.Okusaasaawa kw'essaawa z'es
B.Balina ebigambo ebirungi okusinga abaana abatayogera nnimi bbiri
C.Obuwangwa bwabwe tebulina kye bukola ku mutindo gw'okufuna olulimi olwokubiri
D.Bayongedde obusobozi bw'okutegeera
GivenAnswer:
Okunoonyereza kulaga nti abaana abayiga olulimi olwokubiri balina ebirungi bingi:

B. Balina ebigambo ebirungi okusinga abaana abatayogera nnimi bbiri. Okuyiga ennimi ebbiri kusobozesa abaana okuba n'ebigambo ebingi era ebyawukana mu nnimi zombi. Kino kibayamba okwongera obusobozi bwabwe obw'okwogera n'okuwandiika.

D. Bayongedde obusobozi bw'okutegeera. Okuyiga olulimi olwokubiri kwongera obusobozi bw'abaana okutegeera ebigambo n'emboozi mu mbeera ez'enjawulo. Kino kibayamba okwetegereza abantu abalala obulungi era n'okutegeera ebibakwatako.

C. Obuwangwa bwabwe tebulina kye bukola ku mutindo gw'okufuna olulimi olwokubiri. Abaana bayinza okuyiga olulimi olwokubiri obulungi singa bafuna omukisa ogw'okwewanika ku lulimi olwo, wadde nga bava mu buwangwa obutali bumu.

A. Okusaasaanya kw'essaawa z'okuyiga tekitegeeza nti abaana bafuna olulimi olwokubiri obulungi. Ky'okulabirako, abaana abayiga olulimi olwokubiri mu ssaawa ntono buli lunaku okumala ebbanga ery'ewala, basobola okulutegeera obulungi okusinga abayiga essaawa nyingi mu biseera ebitono.

Question:
Omukozi mu kkampuni ennene ekola emirimu asanga omulimu nga gukaluubirira, era n'akola omulimu ogwo olw'okufuna ssente zokka. Omukozi akola kitono nnyo, era takubirizibwa n'olwekyo afuna omuwendo ogusingayo oba omutindo ogusingayo obulungi. F. Herzberg'in iki faktör fikrina göre, bu işçi'nin kendi dürtüsü için 10'ü arttıracağı en iyi yolu, bu işçiyi teşekkür edecek.
A.okuwaayo omusaala ogw'okwongeza n'okukubiriza okukola obulungi
B.Kola omulimu ogwo okusobola okufuna ekizibu n'okuwulira ng'otuukirizza
C.Okwongera ku mikisa gy'okukolagana n'abalala
D.Yamba omukozi okufuna ettutumu
GivenAnswer:
Okusinziira ku ndowooza ya F. Herzberg ku nsonga ezikwata ku kukubiriza abakozi, ekiruubirirwa ekisinga obulungi okusobola okwongera okwewaayo kw'omukozi eri omulimu gwe kwe kumuwa omulimu ogulina amakulu era ogusobola okumuwa ekitiibwa n'okumuwulira ng'atuukirizza.

Noolwekyo, okuddamu okutuufu okusinziira ku ndowooza ya Herzberg kwe kulonda B: Kola omulimu ogwo okusobola okufuna ekizibu n'okuwulira ng'otuukirizza.

Herzberg akkiririza nti abakozi bakubirizibwa ennyo omulimu bwe guba nga gulina amakulu era nga gusobola okubawa essanyu n'okwewaayo. Okuwa abakozi emirimu egibagagga, egibawa amaanyi era egyetaagisa okukozesa obusobozi bwabwe kiyamba okubawa essanyu mu mulimu gwabwe era kibasobozesa okukola ennyo.

Ebiddibwamu ebirala, okugeza nga okuwaayo omusaala ogw'okwongeza, okwongera ku mikisa gy'okukolagana n'abalala, oba okuyamba omukozi okufuna ettutumu, biyinza okuba ebirungi naye tebikola nnyo ku nsonga enkulu ezikubiriza abakozi okusinziira ku ndowooza ya Herzberg.

Question:
Mu mbeera y'ensi yonna, tuyinza tutya okunnyonnyola obulungi ekigambo 'enkulaakulana'?
A.Okukulaakulanya ekigambo kitegeeza embeera y'omuntu nga waliwo eddembe okuva mu kutya n'okwagala; waliwo ebyobugagga ebimala okuyimirizaawo obulamu era obulamu buno busobola okubaawo mu mbeera etaliimu bulabe, oba obulabe obuteeberezebwa, obw'okutaataaganyizibwa amangu.
B.Okusobola okutwalibwa ng'ekulaakulana, eggwanga lirina okuba nga lifunye ekifo ekimu eky'ebyenfuna n'ebyobufuzi mu nteekateeka y'eggwanga mu nsi yonna; n'olwekyo, ebyo ebyetaagisa okukolagana mu nteekateeka eno bye bisinziira okutegeera embeera 'eyakula'.
C.Enkulaakulana y'engeri y'okugonjoolamu obutakkaanya obugenda mu maaso n'enkulaakulana y'ensi yonna eya neoliberal. Mu mbeera eno, enkulaakulana kitegeeza obusobozi bw'abantu oba ekitundu okukozesa obulungi ebyobugagga n'okwongera okukola obulungi n'okubunyisa, okutumbula engabanya y'ensimbi mu bantu.
D.Okukulaakulanya ekitundu kitegeeza enkola y'empisa n'endowooza abantu baayo gye beewandiisa. Mu nteekateeka y'ensi yonna ey'ensi yonna kino kitegeeza okutandikawo endowooza y'obugwanjuba eya liberal democracy n'ebyenfuna eby'akatale ak'eddembe.
GivenAnswer:
Okuddamu kw'ekibuuzo kino, nzikiriza nti ennyonyola y'ekigambo "enkulaakulana" erimu ebintu bingi era nga terina kumalirako ku nsonga emu yokka. Naye mu mbeera y'ensi yonna, ennyonyola esinga obulungi eri mu nnukuta A.

Enkulaakulana erina okujjumbira ebyetaago by'omuntu n'eddembe lye. Kino kitegeeza nti abantu balina okuba n'eddembe okuva mu kutya n'okwagala, era balina okuba n'ebyobugagga ebimala okubayamba okuyimirizaawo obulamu obulungi. Okwongera ku ekyo, abantu balina okubeera mu mbeera ey'emirembe n'obukuumi.

Newaakubadde nga ennyonyola endala zirina ebirowoozo ebimu ebirungi, zisinga okussaako essira ku nsonga emu yokka nga ebyenfuna oba ebyobufuzi. Naye ennyonyola A ejjumbira ebyetaago by'omuntu mu ngeri ey'omunda n'ey'okungulu, era ekirowoozo kino kisinga okutuukiriza ebisaanyizo by'enkulaakulana ey'amazima.

N'olwekyo, mu mbeera y'ensi yonna, ennyonyola A y'esinga obulungi okunnyonnyola ekigambo "enkulaakulana" kubanga ejjumbira ebyetaago by'abantu n'eddembe lyabwe mu ngeri ey'omunda n'ey'okungulu.

Question:
Ku bino wammanga, kiki ekisinga okunnyonnyola obulagirizi obukwata ku kwegatta n'abaali bakasitoma?
A.Abasawo b'ekinnansi tebakkirizibwa kwegatta na bantu abaaliko eddagala mu mbeera yonna.
B.Abasawo b'ekinnansi tebakkirizibwa kwegatta na bantu abaaliko eddagala okumala omwaka mulamba oluvannyuma lw'okukomezebwa eddagala.
C.Abasawo b'ekinnansi tebakkirizibwa kwegatta na bantu abaaliko eddagala mu mbeera ezimu (ekyokulabirako, nga waliwo akabi ak'okukozesa obubi).
D.Abasawo b'ekinnansi tebakkirizibwa kwegatta na bantu abaaliko eddagala.
GivenAnswer:
C. Abasawo b'ekinnansi tebakkirizibwa kwegatta na bantu abaaliko eddagala mu mbeera ezimu (ekyokulabirako, nga waliwo akabi ak'okukozesa obubi).

Ensonga eri nti abasawo b'ekinnansi balina obuvunaanyizibwa obw'enjawulo eri abalwadde baabwe era bateekwa okukuuma enkolagana ey'ekikugu. Naye okugaana ddala kwegatta n'omuntu yenna eyali aliko eddagala kiyinza obutaba bwenkanya era tekikkirizibwa. 

Wabula, waliwo embeera ezimu abasawo mwe bateekwa okwewala enkolagana ey'okwegatta n'abaali bakasitoma, nga ezimu ku zo:
- Singa wabaawo akabi nti omuntu ayinza okudda mu kukozesa obubi eddagala
- Singa enkolagana eyinza okutabulatabula obujjanjabi bw'omulwadde
- Singa waliwo obuteesigika ku nsonga z'obwesigwa n'ebyama by'omulwadde

N'olwekyo, ekirungi kwe kugoberera amagezi n'emisingi egy'empisa mu kusalirawo ku nsonga eno, nga weesigamiziddwa ku mbeera ey'enjawulo.

Question:
Omulunzi w'ebisolo mu kiseera kino ye nnannyini kiwandiiko ky'ettaka eriyitibwa "A. " Kye kisinga obuwanvu ku bintu bibiri ebiriraanyeewo ku lusozi. Omulimi ye nnannyini ppaaka "B," esangibwa wansi ku "A" ku lusozi. Mu 2000, omulunzi w'ebisolo, eyalina ebitundu byombi eby'ettaka, yazimba enkola y'amazzi g'obwannannyini. Enkola eno yalimu payipu ey'omu ttaka eyali etambulira ku ttaka zombi. Kasasiro okuva mu ppaaka "A" yavudde mu nteekateeka n'agenda mu kaabuyonjo ya munisipaali, eyali wansi w'olusozi. Mu 2005, omulunzi w'ebisolo yaguza omulimi ensawo "B". Ekiwandiiko ky'omulimi tekyayogera ku nkola y'amazzi g'omulunzi w'ebisolo. Ku buli ppaaka kuliko amayumba amanene ag'ekika kya ranch agabeeramu bannannyini go. Gye buvuddeko, amazzi ga kasasiro gatandise okufulumya akawoowo akatasanyusa mu ppaaka "B. " N'ekyavaamu, omulimi yatwala omulunzi w'ebisolo mu kkooti ng'asaba ebintu ebyonooneka olw'enkola y'amazzi. Omusango gulina kuba gwa kusala musango.
A.Omulunzi w'ebisolo, kubanga ekiwandiiko ky'omulimi tekyalimu ndagaano yonna ekugira omulunzi okukozesa ettaka.
B.omulunzi w'ebisolo, kubanga ekigendererwa ekituufu eky'omulimi kyandibadde kya kutawaanya, mu kifo ky'okuyingira mu nnyumba.
C.omulimi, kubanga enkola y'amazzi yali kumpi n'omusango gw'omuwawaabirwa ng'ensonga y'amateeka.
D.omulimi, kubanga omulunzi teyalina buyinza kulongoosa ttaka lye mu ngeri eyaleeta akabi ku mulala.
GivenAnswer:
Okusinziira ku byokulabirako ebiweebwa, ekiddibwamu ekituufu kye D. Omulimi yandibadde omusango, kubanga omulunzi teyalina buyinza kulongoosa ttaka lye mu ngeri eyaleeta akabi ku mulala.

Ensonga z'ekiddibwamu kino ze zino:

1. Omulunzi w'ebisolo yazimba enkola y'amazzi g'obwannannyini ku ttaka lye nga tannaguza kitundu ky'ettaka eri omulimi. Kino kiraga nti enkola yali erina okukola nga tesobya muntu mulala.

2. Ekiwandiiko ky'omulimi tekyalimu ndagaano yonna ekugira omulunzi okukozesa ttaka lye. Naye kino tekitegeeza nti omulunzi yalina eddembe okukozesa ttaka lye mu ngeri yonna gye yayagala.

3. Newankubadde nga ekigendererwa ky'omulimi teyali kutawaanya, kino tekikola nsonga kubanga omulunzi akyalina obuvunaanyizibwa obutaleeta kabi ku baliraanwa be.

4. Mu mateeka, omuntu alina obuvunaanyizibwa obutakola kintu kyonna ku ttaka lye ekiyinza okuleeta akabi ku ttaka ly'omuliraanwa. Kino kiyitibwa "omusango gw'omuwawaabirwa."

N'olwekyo, omulunzi w'ebisolo yalina obuvunaanyizibwa okulaba nti enkola ye y'amazzi teyali nnemalira ttaka lya mulimi. Bw'atakikola kino, asobola okuvunaanibwa olw'obutaba na buvunaanyizibwa.

Question:
Omukyala ow'emyaka 54 ajja mu ofiisi olw'obulumi bw'okukuba amasasi ku matama ge ag'oku ddyo n'ekigwo mu wiiki 3 eziyise. Buli mupiira gw'obulumi gumala akasekondi 1 oba wansi. Obulumi buno butera okuleetebwa empewo enzirugavu, okunywegera, okukwata amannyo n'okwoza amannyo. Tafunye buzibu bwonna ku maaso wadde ku mutwe. Ebyafaayo by'obujjanjabi byewuunyisa olw'obulumi bw'omutwe obw'amaanyi, obunene obungi, n'okulongoosebwa kw'omu lubuto. Muwanvu sentimita 165 (5 ft 5 in) era alina obuzito bwa kkiro 62 (137 lb); BMI ya 23 kg/m2 . Obubonero obw'omugaso bwa bulijjo. Omulwadde tasobola kugumiikiriza kukwata ku ludda lwa ddyo mu maaso. Tewali bunafu bw'amaaso oba okufiirwa okuwulira. Okukeberebwa kw'omubiri okusigaddewo kulaga nti tewali kikyamu kyonna. Okukebera omutwe ku CT n'enjawulo n'obutabeera na njawulo kiraga nti tewali kikyamu. Ku bino wammanga, ddagala ki erisinga obulungi mu kiseera kino?
A.Carbamazepine
B.Lamotrigine
C.Levetiracetam
D.Topiramate
GivenAnswer:
Ku bino wammanga, ddagala erisinga obulungi mu kiseera kino kye Carbamazepine.

Ensonga:

1. Obubonero bw'omukyala ono bulagira nti ayinza okuba n'obulwadde bwa Trigeminal Neuralgia, obulwadde obuleeta obulumi obw'amaanyi mu mutwe n'amaaso.

2. Carbamazepine kye kimu ku ddagala erisookerwako mu kujjanjaba Trigeminal Neuralgia era kitera okuba eky'omugaso nnyo mu kugonjoola obubonero.

3. Newankubadde nga ddagala endala nga Lamotrigine, Levetiracetam, ne Topiramate nazo zisobola okukozesebwa, Carbamazepine y'esinga okulongoosebwa era okukkirizibwa mu kujjanjaba Trigeminal Neuralgia.

4. Okukebera kw'omutwe okuli CT tekulaze nsonga ndala yonna eyinza okuleetawo bulumi buno, kino kyongera okunyweza endowooza nti Trigeminal Neuralgia y'esinga okuba ensonga y'obulumi buno.

N'olwekyo, Carbamazepine kye ddagala erisinga obulungi okukozesebwa ku mulwadde ono mu kiseera kino. Naye, singa obubonero tebugonjooka oba singa wabaawo emitawana, ddagala eddala liyinza okukozesebwa.
